experience.description: Software Engineer with 7 years of experience at Intel building AI-driven automation, validation pipelines, and debugging systems. Strong proficiency in C, C++, Python, Machine Learning, LLMs, RAG, with experience in drivers, OS integration (ChromeOS/Android) and system-level automation.
responsibilities: Debugged and resolved 50+ critical kernel-level issues (GPU hangs, memory corruption, driver crashes), improving system stability across Intel platforms
Developed AI-powered debug automation systems using Python, ML, and LLMs, reducing manual debug time by 25-30%
Automated validation pipelines for GPU drivers and media/display features (HDMI, DP, Vulkan, codecs), ensuring compliance across ChromeOS/Android platforms
Designed and deployed an LLM-based log analysis assistant, enabling error classification, root-cause extraction, and faster resolution
Built Python test automation frameworks integrated with CI/CD pipelines for regression and performance validation
As Domain Integration Engineer, collaborated with multiple teams in Device driver, Firmware and Validation to resolve deadlocks on debugs and deliverables
Collaborated with Google to understand technical requirements and deliver solutions aligned with Chrome OS and Android development
achievements: Recognized as a top performer and received DRA and SRA (Prestigious Intel Awards) awards for automation and innovation
Published 3 papers on AI and Graphics PnP features in Intel conferences
Reduced debugging time by 25-30% through AI-based automation tools
Successfully delivered cross-team solutions to Google for ChromeOS/Android platforms

experience.description: Worked on testing Best Known Configuration (BKC) and Power & Performance (PnP) for server platforms. Built automation framework using Raspberry Pi and relay switches.
responsibilities: Worked on testing Best Known Configuration (BKC) and Power & Performance (PnP) for server platforms
Built automation framework using Raspberry Pi and relay switches
Developed a machine learning-based automation framework to streamline SysDebug processes
achievements: Reduced debugging time by implementing AI-based automation tools
Received accolades for innovative automation solutions

education.degree: Master of Science in Information Science
activities: APCOG Labs - Software Testing with JMeter and Selenium
